name: Kinto
comment:
[Kinto](http://www.kinto-storage.org/) client to ease communicating with
the REST API.

Kinto is the backend for your next application. It's a generic JSON document
store with sharing and synchronisation capabilities. It's open source. It's
easy to deploy. You can host it yourself, own your data and keep it out of
silos.

# Creating requests
You create requests on either an item or a plural (list) endpoint.
[Kinto concepts](http://kinto.readthedocs.io/en/stable/concepts.html) explain
that in details.

Plural (list) endpoints are:
- buckets: `buckets/`
- collections: `buckets/:bucketId/collections/`
- records: `buckets/:bucketId/collections/:collectionId/records/`

Item endpoints are:
- bucket: `buckets/:bucketId`
- collection: `buckets/:bucketId/collections/:collectionId`
- record: `buckets/:bucketId/collections/:collectionId/records/:recordId`

@docs get, getList, create, update, replace, delete

# Sorting, limiting, filtering
@docs sortBy, limit, withFilter, Filter

# Configure a client and resources
@docs Client, client, Auth, headersForAuth, Resource, bucketResource, collectionResource, recordResource, decodeData, encodeData, errorDecoder

# Types and Errors
@docs Endpoint, endpointUrl, ErrorDetail, Error, extractError, toResponse

# Sending requests
@docs send, toRequest

aliases.name: Client
aliases.comment: A Kinto Client. Constructed using the `client` helper.
aliases.type: { baseUrl : String, headers : List ( String, String ) }

aliases.name: ErrorDetail
aliases.comment: A type for Kinto error details.
aliases.type: { errno : Int, message : String, code : Int, error : String }

aliases.name: Resource
aliases.comment:
A type for resources. Constructed using one of `bucketResource`,
`collectionResource` or `recordResource`.
aliases.type: { itemEndpoint : String -> Kinto.Endpoint , listEndpoint : Kinto.Endpoint , itemDecoder : Json.Decode.Decoder a , listDecoder : Json.Decode.Decoder (List a) }

types.name: Endpoint
types.comment:
A type for Kinto API endpoints.

    RecordEndpoint "bucket-name" "collection-name" "item-id"

types.name: Error
types.comment: A type for all errors that the elm-client may return.

types.name: Filter
types.comment: A type for filtering, used with `withFilter`

values.name: bucketResource
values.comment:
A constructor for a bucket resource.

    bucketResource bucketDecoder

values.name: client
values.comment:
A constructor for a `Client`.

    client
        "https://kinto.dev.mozaws.net/v1/"
        (Basic "username" "password")

values.name: collectionResource
values.comment:
A constructor for a collection resource.

    collectionResource "bucket-name" collectionDecoder

values.name: create
values.comment:
Create a POST request on a plural endpoint:

    create resource data
values.type: Kinto.Resource a -> Kinto.Body -> Kinto.Client -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a

values.name: decodeData
values.comment: A decoder for a basic Kinto response.

values.name: delete
values.comment:
Create a DELETE request on an item endpoint:

    delete resource itemId
values.type: Kinto.Resource a -> String -> Kinto.Client -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a

values.name: encodeData
values.comment: An encoder for a basic Kinto query.

values.name: endpointUrl
values.comment:
Get the full url to an endpoint.

    endpointUrl "https://kinto.dev.mozaws.net/v1/" (RecordListEndpoint "default" "test-items")

values.name: errorDecoder
values.comment:
A decoder for `ErrorDetail`. This is the kind of json message answered by Kinto when there's an error:

    {"errno":104,
     "message":"Please authenticate yourself to use this endpoint.",
     "code":401,
     "error":"Unauthorized"}

values.name: extractError
values.comment: Extract an `Error` from an `Http.Error`.

values.name: get
values.comment:
Create a GET request on an item endpoint

    get resource itemId
values.type: Kinto.Resource a -> String -> Kinto.Client -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a

values.name: getList
values.comment:
Create a GET request on one of the plural endpoints

    getList resource

values.name: headersForAuth
values.comment:
Return the header name and value for the given `Auth`.

    headersForAuth (Basic "username" "password")

values.name: limit
values.comment:
Add [limit query parameters](http://kinto.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/1.x/pagination.html) to the request sent to the Kinto server.

    client
        |> getList recordResource
        |> limit 10
        |> send TodosFetched

values.name: recordResource
values.comment: A constructor for a record resource.
values.type: Kinto.BucketName -> Kinto.CollectionName -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> Kinto.Resource a

values.name: replace
values.comment:
Create a PUT request on an item endpoint:

    put resource itemId
values.type: Kinto.Resource a -> String -> Kinto.Body -> Kinto.Client -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a

values.name: send
values.comment:
Send a request to the Kinto server.

    client
        |> create resource data
        |> send TodosCreated
values.type: (Result.Result Kinto.Error a -> msg) -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: sortBy
values.comment:
Add [sorting query parameters](http://kinto.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/1.x/sorting.html) to the request sent to the Kinto server.

    client
        |> getList recordResource
        |> sortBy ["title", "description"]
        |> send TodosFetched
values.type: List String -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a

values.name: toRequest
values.comment:
Extract the Http.Request component of the request, for introspection,
testing, or converting to a `Task` using `Http.toTask`.

    client
        |> create resource data
        |> toRequest

values.name: toResponse
values.comment: Change the error from an `Http.Error` to an `Error`.
values.type: Result.Result Http.Error a -> Result.Result Kinto.Error a

values.name: update
values.comment:
Create a PATCH request on an item endpoint:

    update resource itemId
values.type: Kinto.Resource a -> String -> Kinto.Body -> Kinto.Client -> HttpBuilder.RequestBuilder a

values.name: withFilter
values.comment:
Add [filtering query parameters](http://kinto.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/1.x/filtering.html) to the request sent to the Kinto server.

    client
        |> getList recordResource
        |> withFilter (NOT "title" "test")
        |> send TodosFetched
